# Dedicated Servers with GPU

Select dedicated GPU servers and handle tasks related to 3D modeling and
rendering, artificial intelligence and complex analytics.

  * Daily and monthly rent
  * For individuals and legal entities
  * Convenient control panel
  * Free technical support

Order Get Consultation

## Build your GPU server

Set the required server parameters. Our configurator will check their
compatibility and determine the cost.

The server you have created will be ready in 1-5 days. If you have any
questions, please contact sales@selectel.ru, Telegram or call 8 800 555 06 75.

### Save with a one-time payment

**3%** for 3+ month

 **7%** for 6+ month

 **15%** for 1+ years

## Why Selectel

### Daily Billing

You can choose a convenient method of payment for using the servers depending
on your project time frames and planned load.

### Data Centers in Russia

We have 6 in-house data centers in Moscow, Saint Petersburg, and Leningrad
Region.

### Mutual Compatibility of Selectel Products

Dedicated servers can be combined with virtual machines into a single
infrastructure to address complex tasks.

### What’s next?

#### Registration in the Control panel

Order a service by registering in the Selectel Control panel and topping up
your balance in the most convenient way.

Create an account

#### Consultation before ordering

By calling us at 8 800 555 06 75, emailing to sales@selectel.ru, or using
Telegram — we will examine the issue and help to find the best solution for
your budget and requirements.

Get a consultation

## FAQ

#### Can I change the configuration?

Servers of ready-made configurations GL40 and GL80 do not change, but you can
build a server with the required characteristics in the configurator.

#### What is the minimum rental period for a GPU server?

You can rent ready-made configurations GL40 and GL80 daily or monthly. For
servers assembled through the configurator, the minimum rental period is 1
month.

#### What operating systems are available for GPU servers?

You can order a server with the latest versions of popular distributions:
Linux (Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS, OpenSUSE and Oracle Linux) and VMware ESXi™, as
well as templates preinstalled with Proxmox software. In addition, you may
install licensed Microsoft software purchased from another provider, as long
as the terms of the applicable license agreement do not conflict with it.
Licenses for software other than Microsoft can be ordered from the control
panel.

#### Can I run my own OS on the server?

Yes. To do so, write a ticket, upload your disk image and install it through
the KVM console.

#### How long does it take to provision a server?

The GL40 and GL80 ready-to-use servers are ready for operation 2 minutes after
ordering. Servers assembled through our configurator are provided within 1-5
days from the date of placing the order.

#### How many IP addresses will be allocated when I order a server?

When you order your first server, we allocate one IP address. You can order
additional IP addresses in  the Networks and Services section.

###  Selectel News

Join us! We have something to tell you — launching new products, holding
events, and conducting promotions.

###  Need help?

Call us at 8 800 555 06 75 or email to sales@selectel.ru — we will examine the
issue and help to find an appropriate solution.

If you have a problem in service operation, submit a ticket.
